verses.roman:
balarāma dāsa--kṛṣṇa-prema-rasāsvādī
nityānanda-nāme haya parama unmādī

synonyms: balarāma-dāsa—of the name Balarāma dāsa; kṛṣṇa-prema-rasa—the nectar of always merging in love of Kṛṣṇa; āsvādī—fully tasting; nityānanda-nāme—in the name of Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu; haya—becomes; parama—greatly; unmādī—maddened.
translation: Balarāma dāsa always fully tasted the nectar of love of Kṛṣṇa. Upon hearing the name of Nityānanda Prabhu, he would become greatly maddened.
